definitions: Rescues someone or an organization from a difficult situation, especially financial.
Secures the release of an arrested person by providing bail money.
Parachutes from an aircraft in an emergency.
Removes water from a boat using a container.
examples: The government bails out the bank.
He bails out his brother from jail.
The pilot bails out before the crash.
She bails out the sinking dinghy.
